Description: Position Title:         ReceptionistEmployment Type: Full-timeSalary:         All-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:         UAEAbout the Client: A leading oil and gas company in UAE.Job Description:  Welcoming visitors and direct them to the appropriate individuals or locations within the organization. Handling incoming phone calls, routing them to the correct department or person Maintaining calendars and appointment schedules for staff members or executives Sorting and distributing mail, managing office supplies, and maintaining a clean and organized reception area.
